specs.title: Product Hero Labelizer Classification System

heroes.definition: Top revenue generators - <10% of products generate 80%+ revenue
heroes.characteristics: High conversion rates, strong revenue contribution, proven demand
heroes.campaign_structure: Separate PMax campaigns or asset groups

sidekicks.definition: Strong converters with insufficient visibility - 10% of products convert well but lack impressions/clicks
sidekicks.characteristics: Good conversion rates when trafficked, under-exposed, revenue potential unrealized
sidekicks.roas_targets: Lower ROAS targets initially to increase volume

villains.definition: Budget drainers - 50% of budget to products that don't convert
villains.campaign_structure: Separate low-budget campaigns or exclude entirely
villains.action: Redirect budget to Heroes and Sidekicks

zombies.definition: Dormant products - 60%+ of products get minimal impressions/clicks
zombies.campaign_structure: Dedicated 'Zombie activation' campaigns with modest budgets
zombies.action: Test in small batches, promote performers to Sidekicks
